name: Corrupted Roots (void warrior, MT-8, Multinovae, lastOrange)
name_original: Corrupted Roots (void warrior, MT-8, Multinovae, lastOrange)
description:
Overview

This game is created during the 2023 Global Game Jam. It is a platformer where the player delves into the roots of a poisoned tree to heal it from corruption.

Controls/Mechanics

  • A-D keys to move
  • Space to jump 
  • Jump up vines to rapidly ascend 
  • Jumping immediately upon hitting a wall will afford you one wall jump
  • Jumping on the mushroom enemy's head will launch the player upward

Credits

  • Christian Hoffman -- Music
  • Evelyn -- Art
  • Grimmethy -- Programming
  • LastOrange -- Programming
  • Mason -- Art
  • Sylva -- Level Design
